notice.title: Important Notice
notice.description: All purchases support server development and maintenance. Items are delivered instantly upon successful payment. For support, contact our team on Discord.

story.title: Our Story
story.part1: SkyBlock Legends was born from a passion for creating the ultimate Minecraft SkyBlock experience. Founded in 2023 by a team of dedicated developers and Minecraft enthusiasts, we set out to revolutionize traditional SkyBlock gameplay with innovative features, custom mechanics, and an incredible community-driven experience.
story.part2: What started as a small server for friends has grown into one of the most advanced SkyBlock servers in the world, hosting thousands of players who embark on epic adventures, build incredible islands, and forge lasting friendships. Our commitment to quality, fairness, and innovation drives everything we do.

footer.description: The ultimate Minecraft survival experience with custom plugins and amazing community.
